body.p: Following the resignation of Tom Gall as a Trustee and as Secretary of the Gentoo foundation, the remaining trustees advertised both positions and have filled the Trustee Vacancy by appointing Deedra Waters to the role.

On IRC Deedra is known as dmwaters. She is no stranger to Gentoo, or the Gentoo Foundation having been one of the original thirteen trustees when the Gentoo Foundation was originally incorporated in 2004 and served as a trustee until her resignation about 18 months ago.
Deedra will be able to provide some continuty from the early days of the Gentoo Foundation and we are pleased to welcome her back to the Gentoo Foundation Inc team.
